speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm okay, thanks. What’s this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m calling regarding your outstanding debt with Global Bank. Can you confirm your name for me?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Jordan. Your account shows a balance of $750. How would you like to settle this today?

speaker: Customer
text: I need to check my finances before deciding.

speaker: Agent
text: I understand. Just so you know, we can set up a payment plan if that helps.

speaker: Customer
text: That could work. Can you send me the details?

speaker: Agent
text: Absolutely, I can send that via email. Can you confirm your email address?

speaker: Agent
text: Great! I will send the details right away. Is there anything else you need?

speaker: Customer
text: No, that’s all for now. Thanks.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! Have a great day.
